Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and draw two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can draw a variety of plants that live in each habitat, showing differences between them.
The student can illustrate a variety of animals found in each habitat, highlighting the diversity of living things.
The student can demonstrate patterns by comparing plant and animal life between the two habitats in their drawings.
The student can organize their drawing to clearly show different plants and animals in each habitat.
